ModMetaData.name: Climate Preference Genes
ModMetaData.author: alite
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds 4 climate preference genes, 2 that shift the comfortable temperature range by 15°C and 2 that shift by 30°C. This means that a pawn with hot climate preference will only comfortable in climates that are 31-41°C, instead of the normal 16-26, while cold climate preference will move the range to be 1-11°C. These genes do stack with similar resistances, so hot climate preference can be combined with heat super-tolerant to allow a pawn to live in environments with a temp range of 31-61°C. They can't be combined with genes that would bring their preference closer to standard though, so cold tolerant genes can't be used alongside the hot climate gene.
